title: PB_1
extract_protocol_ch1: DNA was extracted with the Sigma Gene Elute Mammalian Genomic DNA miniprep Kit, according to standard instructions.
hyb_protocol: bisulphite converted DNA was amplified, fragmented and hybridised to Illumina Infinium Human Methylation450k Beadchip using standard Illumina protocol
scan_protocol: Beachips were scanned using an iScan
data_processing: Raw intesities exported from GenomeStudio software were imported into R and analyzed with the Bioconductor lumi package. Probes on chromosomes X and Y were removed. Probes with a detection P-value > 0.01 exceeding 5% of the samples were also filtered out. Color-bias adjustment and quantile normalization were performed as implemented in lumi. BMIQ correction was applied to beta values to correct for probe type bias.

extract_protocol_ch1: DNA was extracted with the Sigma Gene Elute Mammalian Genomic DNA miniprep Kit, according to standard instructions.
hyb_protocol: bisulphite converted DNA was amplified, fragmented and hybridised to Illumina Infinium Human Methylation450k Beadchip using standard Illumina protocol
scan_protocol: Beachips were scanned using an iScan
data_processing: Raw intesities exported from GenomeStudio software were imported into R and analyzed with the Bioconductor lumi package. Probes on chromosomes X and Y were removed. Probes with a detection P-value > 0.01 exceeding 5% of the samples were also filtered out. Color-bias adjustment and quantile normalization were performed as implemented in lumi. BMIQ correction was applied to beta values to correct for probe type bias.
